title: Band, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop and twist with twist return
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Band of Point d'Alençon with a design of a basket filled floral sprays and other motifs. Fond: réseau mouché. Modes: bride tortillée, portes, gaze quadrillée, point mignon.
